alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Autauga, southwestern Chilton, northwestern Lowndes and northeastern Dallas Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tyler, or near Selmont-West Selmont, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Autaugaville, White Hall, Billingsley, Benton, Booth, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Tyler, Dallas County Horse Arena, Mulberry, Paul M Grist State Park, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Robert F. Henry Lock And Dam, Craig Field Aiport, Valley Creek Junction and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
